name.description: The name of the to-be-created RequestValidator.

restApiId.description: [Required] The identifier of the RestApi for which the RequestValidator is created.

validateRequestBody.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether to validate request body according to the configured model schema for the method (true) or not (false).

validateRequestParameters.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether to validate request parameters, true, or not false.
